titles.title: Silver And Gold Have I None

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Silver and gold have I none,
But such as I have give I thee;
In the name of Jesus Christ,
Of Nazareth rise up and walk.
Walking and leaping and praising God,
Walking and leaping and praising God.
In the name of Jesus Christ,
Of Nazareth rise up and walk.
